wikipedia_page.main: Edmund "Ted"/"Teddy" Beswick (birth registered July→September 1858 – died 23 January 1911) was an English rugby union footballer who played in the 1870s and 1880s. He played at representative level for England, and Lancashire, and at club level for Swinton, as a Three-quarter, i.e. wing or inside centre. Prior to Tuesday 2 June 1896, Swinton was a rugby union club.

response: * January 23 – Edmund Beswick, English rugby football player (b. 1858)
